content: विकाशः {@--1@} Manifestation, display, exhibition. {@--2@} Blowing, expanding (usually written विकास in this sense); <ls>Ku. 3. 29.</ls> {@--3@} An open or direct course; विकाशमीयुर्जगतीशमार्गणाः <ls>Ki. 15. 52.</ls> {@--4@} An oblique course; <ls>Ki. 15. 52.</ls> {@--5@} Joy, pleasure; <ls>Ki. 15. 52.</ls> {@--6@} Sky, heaven (आकाश); <ls>Ki. 15. 52.</ls> {@--7@} Eagerness, ardent desire; <ls>Śi. 9. 41</ls> (where it means ‘blowing’ also). {@--8@} Retreat, solitude, privacy.
